short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Draft Linkedin comments using AI for posts based on the its contents. Choose from our predefined styles or write your own prompt.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a button to the Linkedin comment window that allows you to draft comments using AI that take into account the post's content and the author's headline. You can pick a style from our predefined library, or write your own custom prompts. 

In the future, we will add support for more social media platforms, and more comment styles.
